name: Pac-Man Pinball Advance
description:
Pac-Man Pinball Advance is a pinball video game developed by Human Soft and published by Namco for the Game Boy Advance. It was released in North America on May 2, 2005. It is part of the Pac-Man video game franchise.

The game switches from normal Pac-Man gameplay to a pinball-style video game. Pac-Man Pinball Advance received negative reviews from critics, who felt that its gameplay was limited.
